home.title: Prof. Dr. Kadriye Ufuk Elgin
home.subtitle: Ophthalmologist
home.summary: I completed my primary education at Kırıkkale Tınaz Primary School, secondary education at TED Foundation Ankara College, and high school education at Ankara Science High School. I completed my medical school undergraduate education at Hacettepe University Faculty of Medicine between 1985-1991, and then completed my specialization training in the Department of Ophthalmology at Hacettepe University Faculty of Medicine, where I entered as the 3rd in the Medical Specialization Exam (TUS) in 1996.

hero.name: Prof. Dr. Kadriye Ufuk Elgin
hero.title: Ophthalmologist
hero.summary: I completed my medical school education at Hacettepe University Faculty of Medicine between 1985-1991 and, as the 3rd highest scorer in the Medical Specialization Exam (TUS), completed my ophthalmology residency at Hacettepe University Faculty of Medicine, Department of Ophthalmology in 1996. I have been working for over 25 years in Turkey's leading eye hospitals in the fields of general ophthalmology, cataract surgery and glaucoma surgery, and I have authored more than 150 articles published in prestigious national and international journals.
